name: Freelance Graphics Presentation File
summary: Slide show presentation created by Freelance Graphics, an older presentation software originally developed by Lotus, who was acquired by IBM; saves a series of slides, typically including a title, subpoints, and graphics on each slide; can still be viewed using the Freelance Mobile Screen Show Player.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: IBM Freelance Mobile Screen Show Player
